RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 76. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSIE'S ANGUS away in good order, allowed the leader to go early, chased that one up the backstretch, lost some position while covered up through the second turn, lodged an inside bid while between horses when straightened for home, drew well clear under steady handling. SIKARA SIKARA lacked early foot, began to move far turn, came five wide into the turn to lose considerable ground to the winner, could not get to that one while finishing up willingly to be clear for the place. ATHENAIS broke back, raced in mid pack early, closer before a half, lodged a bid between horses second turn,held a narrow advantage between calls in upper stretch, could not contain the top two late while narrowly saving the show. SANTANGELO back off the pace and the inside, lodged a bid on the outside midway on the final bend, narrowly showed the way past the furlong marker, weakened, outfinished for the show. ELMO'S SECRET fell back to trail, devoid of speed for six furlongs, improved position through some traffic with some belated interest through the lane, not a serious threat. FITTS N STARTS settled off the pace, came up empty for the stretch run. KHOZY TAP broke back, quickly moved up to be well clear before a quarter, showed the way the next half mile, began to weaken when headed late in the final turn. WORLD OF HURT broke back and remained there in failing to menace. SARATOGA PASODOBLE began a steady retreat after a half, trailed home.

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Pasodoble
ENTRY.COMMENT: staged a steady retreat after a half

ENTRY.NAME: Elmo's Secret
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, improved, mild interest thru traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie's Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, traffic 2nd turn, bid btwn foes drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sikara Sikara
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, 5w into lane, willing, edged clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Athenais
ENTRY.OWNER: Necaise Mark and Loy John K
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, advanced, bid btwn foes 2nd turn, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Khozy Tap
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, quickly moved up to clear, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Fitts N Starts
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, came up empty for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Santangelo
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, outside bid 2nd turn, led,outfinished 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: World of Hurt
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, failed to menace

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 62. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THROUGH THE CRACKS contested the issue up front out of the chute while widest of the first flight, continued to battle three wide into the turn, dueled entering the stretch, fell back a bit past midstretch then came again late to prove best in a determined effort. MS. PRIESTLY broke well, vied between horses in the run up the backstretch, dueled late in the turn and through the stretch, /held the advantage a furlong out, outfinished in the late going. SHEZA CAT last away, void of speed, four wide when moving closer through the turn, continued to close the gap on the top two late while clear of the others. GALAXY AFFAIR void of speed, continued back late turn, improved position through the stretch while not a serious threat. TERRI GOT A FRIEND went one paced in midpack in lacking a closing response. MAVE RUNNER broke on top, flashed speed along the inside for almost four furlongs and began to fade. DARING DARIAN made little impact in lacking a bid. ATALANTA ASTERIA was finished early, fell far back and jogged in late.

ENTRY.NAME: Atalanta Asteria
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Galaxy Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, improved position through traffic

ENTRY.NAME: Mave Runner
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, early speed inside, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Daring Darian
ENTRY.COMMENT: made little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Sheza Cat
ENTRY.OWNER: Duffy's Racing Stable LLC and Heider Racing Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of speed, 4w turn, clear of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Terri Got a Friend
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, went one paced in lacking response

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Priestly
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, vied btwn early, dueled inside, outkicked late

ENTRY.NAME: Through the Cracks
ENTRY.COMMENT: contested pace 3w, dueled stretch, determined

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 36000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $50,000 WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACE. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Allowed 3 lbs . Claiming Price $50,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOURALIVIA within striking distance early while racing outside, ranged up on the outside to challenge exiting the turn, kicked well clear through the stretch under steady handling. BANDIT'S PRIDE back off the pace for a half, rallied to be clear for the place, no match for the winner. THE CALLING STONE lacked speed while racing outside, four wide and behind the winner into the stretch, along for the show. QUEEN OF THE MOON off a step slow, trailed for over a half, picked off a couple of tiring rivals late. CAJUN CATALINA dueled up front along the inside, weakened. STORMY VALENTINE alternated up front for a half in the two path and also faltered through the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Queen of the Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Cajun Catalina
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bandit's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, rallied 2nd, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p for a half, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Fouralivia
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, outside bid, kicked clear

ENTRY.NAME: The Calling Stone
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed outside, 4w into lane, along for show

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7F Dirt CR: 89. Starter Allowance Purse 21000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5000 OR LESS IN ONE OF THEIR LAST FIVE STARTS. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since Ju ne 3, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOSY BANKER chased the early leader out of the chute and up most of the backstretch, lodged an inside move to duel into and through the turn, shook off the other speed nearing the furlong marker and drew clear under pressure. DRAFT CHOICE broke on top, clear out of the chute, continued to hold a daylight advantage most of the backstretch, allowed the winner the inside into the turn, dueled with that one through the bend and into the stretch then could not keep up, narrowly lasted for the second spot. CUSTOM BLUE GRASS in the second flight while racing off the inside, within striking distance into the lane, could do little with the winner the final furlong, narrowly missed the place. WIN YA WIN in mid pack, raced three wide through the turn, did not have enough late to challenge for the place. GUITAR TRIBUTE void of speed out in the strip, displayed a mild amount of late interest to better his position. IZZY'S BABY BOY broke forwardly, raced within striking distance for a half while saving ground, had little for the drive. ARCTIC ROSE back off the pace toward the inside, continued to save ground through the lane, failed to respond when called on for the drive. SCHNELL last to leave, void of speed, moved out, four wide into the stretch, made little impact in the run to the wire. HOT LE ROY in the main body for a half, tired through the stretch. WAITIN' ON A WOMAN fell back after the start and was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Izzy's Baby Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke forwardly, within striking distance, little left drive

ENTRY.NAME: Arctic Rose
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace inside, lacked response stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Schnell
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, raced back, four wide into lane, little impact

ENTRY.NAME: Win Ya Win
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack and three wide, not enough late for n2d

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Le Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: main body for a half, tired through the stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Nosy Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, inside move, dueled, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Waitin' On a Woman
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back, always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Blue Grass
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail, just missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, mild late interest to improve

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly,cleared soon after,dueled turn 2p,no match,held 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 81. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 18000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over On The Turf Since July 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since June 3, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HUSHED COURT ROOM broke in but forwardly, showed the way into the first turn, continued to show the way backstretch while rating, clear into the lane, held several rivals safe late under firm handling to prevail. ANGEL OF VERDUN lacked speed off the inside, angled out a bit when advancing late in the final turn, came five wide for the drive, finished well to be in time for the place while closing the gap on the winner. KATIE'S KARAT carried out five wide into the first turn when forwardly placed, vied on the outside backstretch, four wide exiting the final turn, could not get to the winner in the run to the wire, caught late for the second spot. CAVE CREEK carried out four wide into the first turn, remained forward, challenged between horses late in the final turn and into the stretch, flattened out late. GOODNIGHTLOVING broke a step slow, lacked speed for six furlongs, continued to lag into the stretch, improved position with some belated interest. SAINT KENNEDY settled back off the pace in mid pack, failed to muster a response in the drive. CASHEW broke in, lacked speed in trailing early, six wide into the lane, never dangerous. GLANCE fell back after the start and failed to menace. EXACTA got out entering the first turn to carry a couple of rivals outward, dueled off the inside the middle half mile, gave way in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Cashew
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, trailed, 6w 1/4, not dangerous

ENTRY.NAME: Hushed Court Room
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in but forwardly, pace, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Glance
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back after the start, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Exacta
ENTRY.COMMENT: got out early, dueled 2p, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Goodnightloving
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, lacked speed for 3/4, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Saint Kennedy
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, lacked response drive

ENTRY.NAME: Cave Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried 4w 3/4, prompted, bid 2nd turn, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Angel of Verdun
ENTRY.OWNER: Peterson Stephen J and Peterson Konnor
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, closer 2nd, 5w into lane, rallied 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Katie's Karat
ENTRY.COMMENT: carried 5w 3/4, moved up to vie, 4w into lane, caught 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS ST. CLAIRE broke well, raced with the pace along the inside, shook clear when straightened for home, maintained daylight to the wire while being kept to task. CAROLINA JACY broke back, improved toward the inside into the lane, continued to advance and edged clear late for the runner up position, no threat to the winner. BROADWAY STAR in mid pack while racing well out in the strip, came five wide into the stretch, up late to earn the show. BRIELLE EVANGELINE moved up to contest the pace after the start, dueled late in the turn outside the winner then began to give way entering the stretch. LUCKY BEAD LADY prompted the issue up front fur three furlongs and faltered in the turn. FAST OUT hopped at the start to be last away, remained back in failing to menace. TOP CON in the second flight for a half, also backed up through the stretch. MAGIC GRAY was finished early.

ENTRY.NAME: Carolina Jacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, improved inside, edged clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, raced back and failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Miss St. Claire
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, with pace inside, shook clear, kept to task

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Spanish Cross Stable, LLC & Dr. J. David Richardson

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: was finished early

ENTRY.NAME: Brielle Evangeline
ENTRY.COMMENT: moved up to contest pace between rivals, gave way drive

ENTRY.NAME: Top Con
ENTRY.OWNER: GM Assets LLC and Meche Shane
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, backed up stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Broadway Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off rail, 5w into lane, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Bead Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace three 3w, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 99. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $35,000. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 3, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since June 3, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Cl aiming Price $35,000 (Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PARROT HEAD chased the winner in heading up the second flight inside, continued to be that one's closest pursuer the middle half, shifted out a bit for the drive, took aim on that same foe a furlong out, late bid, up final strides. DECCAN PRINCE (IRE) broke on top, sprinted well clear past the wire the first time, extended that advantage before a half, continued to lead by daylight with a furlong remaining, could not contain the winner, remained well clear for the place. SILENT POWER last to leave, void of speed while saving ground, continued along the inside second turn, angled out when straightened for home, rallied for the show while not a serious threat to the top pair. FIRST GLIMPSE four wide into the first turn when with the second flight, remained toward the front the middle half mile, came up empty for the stretch run. INTIMIDATION in the second flight while between for six furlongs, weakened through the stretch. PEACOCK KITTEN settled off the pace, continued in even fashion in lacking a closing response. PACIFICISLANDTIME remained always back in failing to rally. ENTERTAINMENT moved up on the outside to be five wide early in the first turn, gave way early in the second bend, continued to weaken stretch. SEVEN FURLONG FRACTIONAL TIME UNAVAILABLE DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Deccan Prince (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top,sprinted clear, glib pace, nailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Parrot Head
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, moved out, late bid, up

ENTRY.NAME: Peacock Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced, lacked closing response

ENTRY.NAME: Intimidation
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Silent Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, lacked speed inside, angled out drive, rallied 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Pacificislandtime
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained always back

ENTRY.NAME: Entertainment
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w into first turn, gave way 2nd bend

ENTRY.NAME: First Glimpse
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w first turn, 2nd flight, empty drive

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 61. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $12,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FOUR DICE off a step slow, lagged back in trailing for a half, angled five wide into the lane when beginning to advance, closed with good resolve to kick down the leader in the waning strides. BUD WON broke alertly, set a pressured pace in the run up the backstretch, shook clear in the turn, maintained a daylight advantage past the furlong marker, nailed late. WHISKEY RED forwardly placed behind the two leaders, remained within striking distance into the lane, proved no match for the top two late while up for the show. GROSSE TETE IAN in the second fight while racing off the inside, lacked a closing repsonse. NEPHI broke back, lacked speed, improved into the stretch, flattened out in the final furlong. POPPA BEAR remained back while racing outside. MECKES PRIORITY pressed the inside, chased the winner through the turn, gave way through the stretch. CALL ME FIREY steadily faded to finish well back.

ENTRY.NAME: Four Dice
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, lagged, angled 5w into lane, kicked down leader

ENTRY.NAME: Nephi
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke back, improved into lane, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Meckes Priority
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed inside, chased turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, no match top two

ENTRY.NAME: Bud Won
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set pressured pace, shook clear turn, nailed late

ENTRY.NAME: Call Me Firey
ENTRY.COMMENT: steadily faded

ENTRY.NAME: Poppa Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back while outside

ENTRY.NAME: Grosse Tete Ian
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight outside, lacked closing bid
